name: Birdocolypse
description: Albert the Space Cat home Planet of KittensFortenton world of comfort and all the kitty treats one could hope to gain, has set off on a journey across Cat Space in search of the dreaded foe....The birds and all their fluffy feathers great for making pillows and blankets. Albert has come across one of the Bird's planets "Big Tree" or more commonly known as "Huge Scratch Post" and upon arrival of the planet has gained an appetite after flying through space as a cat does. As such Albert has decided it is yum 0 clock, the fated battle between Cat and Bird begins again!
